ISSUE.TITLE: Search order with vendor filter show multiple order with the same order id
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Store with one or more vendors 2. Order with ID = 2144 that contain 6 products from vendor X 3. in Order search UI select vendor X and seach all Order result: it will show 6 orders (= orderItem.count) in the result ![Unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59456113/90898193-97523b80-e3c6-11ea-824a-55485c64e2a5.PNG)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4989 Fixed issue with duplicates in a search result when a single vendor relate to different order items
